channel.title: CVE Feed for Automattic -- WordPress.com Editing Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Automattic -- WordPress.com Editing Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2023-50879|2023-12-29T11:31:24.984Z -- automattic -- wordpress.com%20editing%20toolkit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Automattic WordPress.Com Editing Toolkit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress.Com Editing Toolkit: from n/a through 3.78784.
